title: Crazy Ping (TPG Unlimited Data Plan)

embed.description: The path between your network and our system supports an MTU of at least 2037 bytes, and the path between our system and your network has an MTU of 1492 bytes. The path MTU bottleneck that fails to properly report the ICMP "too big" is between * and *.

body:
@Sephiroth5G

I've read previous threads on people carrying the same issue as I am (crazy ping in the 1000s -SOMETIMES 10,000s!!!) and I've read others whose problems have been resolved by you so hopefully, u can help me out too! 

I did the Netalyz results and linked it, hopefully, that's enough info to start you off with.

Also, I don't really understand how the WinMTR works (so please help walk me through it if it helps u to help me lol)

replies.body:
Greetings! I tried to take a look at your Netalyzr logs, but it looks like I can't access them. :c Can you try running another test? 

In the meantime, give this handy connection troubleshooting tool a shot:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader
